summary: Tweedy college professor discovers his new TV set is animate, apparently possessed by something from the future, and militantly intent on regulating his daily life.
cast: Hans Conried|William H. Lynn|Gloria Blondell|Edwin Max|Janet Warren|Evelyn Beresford|Bob Jellison|Norman Field|Stephen Roberts|Connie Marshall|William Phipps|Bennie Washington|Lenore Kingston|Alice Backes|Charles Phillips|Gayle Pace|Al Jarvis|Joe Hawthorne|Jackson Wheeler|Jack Rourke|Trilby Conried|Vic Perrin|Florence Ravenel|Buddy Roosevelt|Brick Sullivan
title: The Twonky
